headline: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) Beats Q1 Earnings Estimates

headline: OTIS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2025 RESULTS
summary: Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS) reported first quarter 2025 net sales of $3.3 billion with organic sales flat versus the prior year. GAAP earnings per share (EPS) decreased 29% to $0.61 and adjusted EPS increased 5% to $0.92.

raw.headline: OTIS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2025 RESULTS

headline: Otis (NYSE:OTIS) Reports Q1 In Line With Expectations, Full-Year Outlook Slightly Exceeds Expectations
summary: Elevator manufacturer Otis (NYSE:OTIS) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 2.5% year on year to $3.35 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $14.7 billion at the midpoint came in 1.2% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.92 per share was 1.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
